Ryan Dahl

Is the man who created Node.js and Deno - JavaScript runtimes.

Timeline of Ryan Dahl's life:

  • Ryan Dahl was born 👶

    Grew up in San Diego, California.

  • His first touch with technology 💻

    Ryan was just 6 years old, when his mother bought him his first computer - the legendary Apple IIc.

  • Edication 🎓

    Attended a community college in San Diego and later transferred into UC San Diego where he studied mathematics. Later on, he went on to attend grad school for Mathematics at the University of Rochester where he studied algebraic topology, which he found "very abstract and beautiful"

  • The great Idea 💡

    Of putting JavaScript and non-blocking IO together (Node.js) sparked in Ryan's head.

  • Node.js was introduced to the world 🌎

    Here's a video with the Ryan Dahl's original presentation

  • Ryan steps away from the Node project 👨‍💻

    Ryan Dahl gave the following reason for moving on from the project: "After three years of working on Node, this frees me up to work on research projects. I am still an employee at Joyent and will advise from the sidelines but I won’t be involved in the day-to-day bug fixes."

  • Deno 🦕

    Is his new JavaScript/TypeScript runtime built with V8. Some of its benefits are improved security, better performance and more. Which of his two great inventions will take advantage? Only time will show us..

  • To be continued

    ...

Sources: Wikipedia, his interview
